data.name: gaia online dark theme and midnight black dark
data.description:
this will make gaia dark, main color will be black however grey, dark blue and some green to make text stand out better 
providing this one because the one dark theme is no longer supported and others are not happy with the dark blue theme. this addresses both of those issues and gives you another option for dark theme 
WILL WORK for gaia upgrade 
WILL WORK by itself with no programs added on
WILL WORK with other scripts turned on 

WILL NOT WORK for better gaia

UPDATE: NO LONGER A GLOBAL SCRIPT PLEASE UPDATE OR REINSTALL!!!

data.name: ScoreSaber Custom
Coffee (Twitter Style)
data.description:
Coffee 5.0

Since Twitter now is forcing the "New Layout" on pretty much everyone, I've decided to update 
this style to work with the new layout.
Not everything works yet, if you have problems or requests send me a dm at @twi_styles.

Features:
-- 3 color themes for you to choose from ( you can use the regular Twitter theme selector at More(in the left sidebar) - > Display or in Settings -> Display. )
-- hide promoted tweets.
-- wide top bar resembling legacy twitter style.
-- add breaks between tweets for easier timeline reading.


Old Coffee style was moved to https://userstyles.org/styles/175461/coffee-legacy.

data.name: Dark: Insta grid, toggle comment, big profile view
data.description:
[07.06.2020.] - scroll bug can't be reproduced

[Update 31.05.2020.] - fixed all issues

- Feed - Grid view (4 per row)
- On posts and feed - comments show up on hover
- Profile view is full width
- When you open post on profile, its bigger!
- Dark Instagram by Denis Mignanelli -  Link: https://userstyles.org/users/421324, licence is CC BY 4.0 Link: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/, special thanks :)

data.name: Custom Duolingo
data.description:
Customizable Duolingo

Features:
Custom colors
Cleaner design
Easy to configure
Mobile mode
Preset Themes

Check out my other styles:
https://userstyles.org/users/812884

I have a Discord channel for easier feedback and discussions about the styles: https://discord.gg/Emv2rtk

Theme by Zhou Yahui

data.name: Twitter-like alive.bar
Hacker News (Basic Dark)
data.description:
Based on the original by Poorchop, that tries to keep the 'stock' HN style just making it a basic dark mode that won't assault your eyes at night.

This version changes the syntax to fix warnings and to improve the upvote arrow that is broken on the original due to changes in recent browsers. New version uses a CSS-only implementation of the upvote button instead of an image and allows user customization for its color.

Here's the recommended colors:
Use #6F6F6F for gray upvote arrow.
Use #FF6600 for orange upvote arrow.
